a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The median age divides the population into two parts of equal size; that is, there are as many people with ages above
the median age as there are with ages below.

g.g: ,Median age - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant: estimates

text.tspan: Data source: United Nations, World Population Prospects (2022)
Note: 1950 to 2021 show historical estimates. From 2022 the UN projections (medium variant) are shown.
